_comment: Claude Code settings template. Copy relevant fields to .claude/settings.json (team) or .claude/settings.local.json (personal). See: https://code.claude.com/docs/en/settings

env._comment: Project-specific environment variables injected into every session

_settings_reference.model: Override default model. e.g. claude-opus-4-6 / claude-sonnet-4-6 / claude-haiku-4-5-20251001
_settings_reference.language: Response language. e.g. japanese / english / spanish
_settings_reference.autoMemoryEnabled: Let Claude accumulate learnings automatically across sessions (default: true)
_settings_reference.permissions.allow: Patterns that bypass permission prompts. e.g. Bash(npm run test *) / Read(~/.zshrc)
_settings_reference.env: Environment variables injected into every Claude Code session
_settings_reference.hooks: PreToolUse / PostToolUse / PreCompact / Stop hooks. See: https://code.claude.com/docs/en/hooks
